programme.title: The 'Brady Bill' and the New England fall
programme.short_synopsis: Congress passes the 1993 Brady Handgun Violence Protection Act.
programme.medium_synopsis: A blazing New England fall offers relief from the violence and disaster of the television news and Congress passes the 'Brady Bill' for gun control.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
